resources.string: Already have an account? Sign In
Facebook icon as an alternative means of logging in
Google icon as an alternative means for logging in

This application is created to help reduce the gender based violence cases in Kenya against Women. 
This is an important step towards achieving the 5 th Sustainable Development Goal set by the United Nations on Gender Equality. 
Gender Equality is all about equal rights and fair treatment. 
This page basically explains how this app tries to solve that 
Emergency contact section: it enables you to access your phone contacts and select a minimum of 2 and a maximum of 5 contacts 
 who will be notified in case of an emergency.You can change the contacts at any time 
Location section: it enables you to access locations of the nearest hospital and police station for help. 
 I hope you will not be in a position to use them but this is for use when the situation gets out of hand. 
Tips contact section: it enables you to access important resources such as articles on what to do and how to respond when such a situation occurs. 
About contact section: it explains more about the application including the features it contains 
Emergency button section: This is the button icon at the bottom of the dashboard. 
 Upon pressing you should receive a prompt on whether to cancel or continue.If you press continue,it will send a call for help message with your current location to your emergency contacts
